scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated and holding the Christ Child, who is reaching towards a lyre played by an angel. Another angel, with large red wings, stands to the left, and a young boy in an orange tunic is seated in front of them. To the right, a kneeling figure in a striped robe looks upwards. The figures are set against a decorative gold and blue patterned background, framed by a blue arch with floral motifs. The lower portion of the scene shows a green, grassy landscape.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with Angels and a Donor
